_sText:
Scouthouse
I designed this map for LAN parties.

About:
A basic 2 house map divided by a canyon.
One scout rests just in front of the spawn while 3 extras are inside the second floor.
There is a large sum of flash bangs and smoke grenades on the second floor as well.
Three platforms separate the map making it difficult but not impossible to cross.
AMBIENT_SOUND! If you fall into the canyon you will hear a scream. Contributes to lol factor.
A skybox surrounds the map.
Lighting illuminates the map as if you were positioned in a canyon.
This map provides short fast paced gameplay depending on your skill level.
Soundscape.
12 Slot.
Medium Size.

Other:
Recommended 2 or 4 players.
Making the map easy on the eyes was critical to scouts.
Chances are I will release more of this type of map, do to good release at LAN party.
I do not recommend this for a server besides LAN because of few slots, and extremely fast gameplay.

Assessing:
Please do not assess if you have not downloaded and play tested with a friend, but i really do appreciate you assessing. If you do asses please do it on these bases. Ambience: How it sounds. Detail: of the map. Fun: How much you had while playing. Looks: How easy was it on your eyes?
Enjoy
